text: Cng klaw theid(muhammad) “mi khır bang nı hmu phakhi khxng phwk than pen phu chinæa thang su sacthrrm?” Cng klaw theid(muhammad)“xallxh thrng chinæa thang su sacthrrm dangnan phu thi chinæa thang su sacthrrm smkhwr kwa thi ca di rab kar ptibati tam(xi ba dah)hrux wa phu thi mi xac ca chinæa phu xun di wentæ ca thuk chinæa thami phwk than cung tadsincı chen nan?”
